Summary I enjoy technical writing and am certified in project management. I gravitate to the new and different and immensely enjoy writing as I learn. I have extensive experience as a lead technical writer and a long, strong history of target audience advocacy. 
 
I have written: 
tutorials | user guides | reference manuals | troubleshooting and error message materials | 
marketing/value statement material | quick-start guides | text for user interfaces | help text 
 
To develop information, I work with subject matter experts, project management, product support, and interaction designers, and also conduct my own research. I validate the clarity, completeness and accuracy of information through user testing and other forms of user interaction. I ensure compliance of our information to writing guidelines and corporate standards. 
 
I use the progressive disclosure model for designing information -- put in front of the user what they need to see most immediately, and then enable a path to more information, as the user needs it. 
 
Specialties: Certified PMP ®, with experience with both waterfall and agile software development methodologies. 
Content management, using XML/SGML publishing technologies that include DITA and HTML.
